snippet: “I was the only woman in the class,” said Ms. McCloskey, who stands out as a rare woman in the land of start-ups. “All the guys either wanted to talk to me or didn’t want me to be there.”
abstract: “I was the only woman in the class,” said Ms. McCloskey, who stands out as a rare woman in the land of start-ups. “All the guys either wanted to talk to me or didn’t want me to be there.”

headline.main: Discouraged in School, Melody McCloskey Thrives as a Tech Entrepreneur
